Text: AOL Anywhere Games by pogocom RegistrationWelcome jreitme Thanks for signing up for a free AOL Anywhere Games account Now that youre all signed up youre just a hop skip and a jump away from playing a ton of games against people from all around the world To get in and play right away just head to this Web site If you have any questions about how to get around or want to read any of our game rules just head here helphelpjspsiteaolc In addition our sponsors are looking forward to your visits as well Anytime you see a banner ad for something you like clicking that ad will open up a new window That way your game wont be interrupted and you can come back to the site at your leisure Our news page is updated regularly so you can always find out the latest happenings game changes and the like on this page miscnewsjspsiteaolc One of the many great features of our Classic Games is our ratings system With our player ratings you can easily tell whether youre playing with a beginner or a shark Questions about ratings can be answered here helpratingshelpjspsiteaolc We have a ton of memberrun online tournaments you can join To see which ones are currently running check here misceventsjspsiteaolc If you have any comments youd like to share about our games or want to report a glitch youve found zip on over here Finally if you lose the password to your account head over to our Recover Password page and have your password emailed to you formsubmitrecoverpasswordjspsiteaolc Thanks for joining and enjoy pogocom Games Team If you have received this message in error please go to the following page to remove your email address from our list unsubscriberemoveemailjsppidhisoinqsgtmppqqksiteaolc
